explanation: Agent A is correct. MISRA C:2023 Rule 17.8 forbids modifying function parameters. In read_cb the parameter "size" (a value parameter) is passed by address to compress_buf (&size). compress_buf writes to *dest_size and therefore modifies the object represented by the parameter "size" inside read_cb — this is a direct violation of Rule 17.8. (By contrast, modifying the object pointed to by a pointer parameter is allowed; memcpy(mem, ...) is fine because it does not reassign the pointer parameter itself.) A suitable fix is to copy the parameter into a local variable (e.g. size_t local_size = size;) and pass &local_size to compress_buf, or change the API so compress_buf returns the modified size in a non-parameter object.)
